Module com.teamsix.databasegui
Package com.teamsix.databasegui

Class POSApplication

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
com.teamsix.databasegui.POSApplication
public class POSApplication extends javafx.application.Application
Initializes a javaFX point of sale system GUI and handles scene changes.

    • insertCartItemID

      public static void insertCartItemID(int ID)
      Given a menu item id, appends the id to the cart arraylist. If cart is not initialized, initializes cart.
      Parameters:
      ID - int menu item id, returned from the backend.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Initializes connection the backend, and launches the application's JavaFX GUI. Assures that once the program ends, the connection to the server is closed.
      Parameters:
      args - There are no CLI inputs for this application.
